contentList.content: Magicians are talented spellcasters, drawing on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline to learn spells.
Born with the promise of magic in their veins, magicians are suffused with a latent power that waits to be honed.

Dragon-like scales cover parts of your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your add your {{$.Balance.MagicianCastingAbility}} <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
When you deal damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you add your {{$.Balance.MagicianCastingAbility}} <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to the damage.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> maximum increases by 1 for each Magician level.
